encyclopedia.content: 音标 英音：['pəustə]美音：['postɚ] posters Noun 1. a sign posted in a public place as an advertisement; "a poster advertised the coming attractions" (synonym) posting, placard, notice ,bill ,card (hypernym) sign (hyponym) show bill, show card , theatrical poster (derivation) post 2. someone who pastes up bills or placards on walls or billboards (synonym) bill

entry.def: A poster is a large notice or picture that you stick on a wall or board, often in order to advertise something.

means.word_mean: 1. a sign posted in a public place as an advertisement;
2. someone who pastes up bills or placards on walls or billboards
3. a horse kept at an inn or post house for use by mail carriers or for rent to travelers

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"邮件,邮政"; 2. 表示"在后面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: post邮件,邮政+al……的→adj.邮政的
post在后面+er+ior……的→后面的
post在后面+graduate毕业→n.研究所学生,研究生 adj.大学毕业后的
post在后面+hum土+ous……的→入土表示死→死后的
post在后面+war战争→adj.战后的
post邮件,邮政→n.邮件,邮政 v. 邮递
post邮件,邮政+age费用→n.邮资
post邮件,邮政+card纸片→n.明信片
post邮件,邮政+er表示东西→n.招贴画,驿站
post邮件,邮政+man人→n.邮差
post邮件,邮政+mark记号→n.邮戳
post邮件,邮政+office办公室→n.邮局
post在后面+date日期→v. 填迟……的日期 n. 事后日期
post在后面+er+ity表名词→后面的人→子孙
post在后面+face脸;前面→后面的脸→刊后语
post在后面+graduate毕业→n.研究所学生,研究生 adj.大学毕业后的
post在后面+script写→写在后面的话
post邮件,邮政→n.邮件,邮政 v. 邮递
post在后面+date日期→v. 填迟……的日期 n. 事后日期
post在后面+pone放→放到后面→推迟
